sentences.en: A hemorrhagic gut was the predominant lesion at autopsy.
sentences.cn: 尸检的主要发现是肠出血.

sentences.en: After the case is adjudicated, you can have access to the autopsy reports.
sentences.cn: 在案件判决之后, 你有权使用尸体解剖报告.

sentences.en: An autopsy eventually ascribed the baby's death to sudden infant death syndrome.
sentences.cn: 尸检最终认定孩子死于婴儿猝死综合征。

sentences.en: An autopsy was needed to ascertain the cause of his death.
sentences.cn: 需验尸方能确定他的死因.

sentences.en: Better save that. We'll need it for the autopsy.
sentences.cn: 还是留著好, 解剖的时候会用到.

sentences.en: Figure 4 shows the locations of these fossae and their at autopsy.
sentences.cn: 图4显示了这些隐窝的位置和其尸检的检出率.

sentences.en: Find something off in that autopsy report, Duck?
sentences.cn: 从那验尸报告里找到什么了吗, 达克?

sentences.en: Is It'still illegal to perform an autopsy on a living person?
sentences.cn: 这年头在活人身上验尸还算犯法的不?

sentences.en: Methods 38 cases of specimens of lhtty heartall COllie from autopsy.
sentences.cn: 研究方法38例脂肪心皆来自尸体解剖.

sentences.en: Preliminary autopsy results show the 64 - year - old Milosevic died of a heart attack.
sentences.cn: 初步验尸结果显示,64 岁 的米洛舍维奇死于心脏病发作.

sentences.en: The autopsy report gave the cause of death as poisoning.
sentences.cn: 验尸报告上显示死因为中毒。

sentences.en: The body was transported to the Chicago medical examiner's office for autopsy.
sentences.cn: 尸体随后被转移到芝加哥医学检查部门准备尸检.

sentences.en: The chest and abdominal cavities are opened here at autopsy.
sentences.cn: 尸体解剖显示胸腔和腹腔.

sentences.en: They're carrying out an autopsy on the victim.
sentences.cn: 他们正在给受害者验尸.

sentences.en: This is your first experience of an autopsy, I believe.
sentences.cn: 我相信这是你们头一次的解剖经历.

words.tran_cn: 验尸；[病理][特医]尸体解剖；尸体剖检

trans.tran_cn: 尸体解剖，验尸，[病理]尸体剖检，（事后的）分析，检查
trans.tran_en: an examination of a dead body to discover the cause of death
